snippet: An obstetrician/gynecologist in Hobbs has been ordered to undergo evaluation for sex addiction as a condition of returning to work.
abstract: Christopher S Driskill, New Mexico obstetrician/gynecologist whose medical license was suspended over accusations that he had sex with patients, is ordered to undergo evaluation for sex addiction as condition of returning to work.
lead_paragraph: An obstetrician/gynecologist in Hobbs has been ordered to undergo evaluation for sex addiction as a condition of returning to work.

headline.main: New Mexico: Deal Would Restore Doctor’s License
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Deal Would Restore Doctor’s License
